Desc.entry: Sheffield Cathedral, in the heart of the city, offers a venue for business meetings and corporate entertainment with eight rooms for hire: 1554 Gallery, capacity 80-100. Hilton Room, capacity 30. Conference Room, capacity 15. Sheffield Town Trust Room, capacity 14. Domino Hall, capacity 150. Barclays Brighter Futures Room, capacity 30. Project Room, capacity 10. The Chapter House, capacity 50. All rooms apart from the Chapter House have Wi Fi. All rooms have a digital projector and screen. The Nave can also be hired for functions/concerts. All catering proceeds support the Cathedral Archer Project (see separate entry), a charity that helps the homeless and vulnerable in Sheffield.

DisabledAccess.entry: All rooms have disabled access apart from the Chapter House. Lift
